EmailTemplate.name: ACC-2016
EmailTemplate.subject: DRE at ACC.16
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Doctor Evidence has significant cardiovascular database assets and it is the proud platform used for guidelines development for the American College of Cardiology and the American Heart Association. Members of out team will be at the American College of Cardiology's 65th Annual Scientific Session & Expo and will be happy to meet with you at your company's booth. Please let me know your availability during the conference.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}, {!User.Title} Doctor Evidence {!User.Phone}
